programme.title: The Real Hunt For Red October
programme.desc: Film lifting the lid on the secret events surrounding the Russian submarine, Red October, that went missing in 1968, and which brought the Soviet Union and US to the brink of war. (1 of 2)

programme.title: The Real Hunt For Red October
programme.desc: Film lifting the lid on the secret events surrounding the Russian submarine, Red October, that went missing in 1968, and which brought the Soviet Union and US to the brink of war. (2 of 2)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: A girl finds a 1000-year-old skull that may prove aliens once walked the planet, and ancient stone carvings could rewrite the story of evolution. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Amazing Survival: Incredible stories of people who cheated death, including a man who escaped from the avalanche of debris caused by the collapse of the World Trade Center.

programme.title: The Unxplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: Secrets of Abandoned Places: From the ancient Babylonian's to modern day urban explorers, mankind has always been fascinated by abandoned places. (S3, ep 11)

programme.title: The Unxplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: Serial Killer Creatures: The animal kingdom is full of deadly predators and some of them attack in extraordinary ways. Do animals pose a greater threat to us than we realise? (S3, ep 13)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: War On The Floor: Les questions Ashley's management skills when two employees get into a fight on the shop floor. Meanwhile, Seth stumbles upon a potentially huge deal. (S13, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Secret Shopper: Les hatches a secret plan to put his employees to the test, but how will Seth, Ashley and Karen react when they find out? (S13, ep 9)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Cousin Vs Cousin: When Ashley interferes with one of Karen's sales on the shop floor, a family feud breaks out. Meanwhile, a rock metal group drops by. (S13, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Seth's Big Mistake: Les finally lands a buyer for his special edition Lee Iacocca Mustang, but loses his cool when he learns Seth sent the hot rod out on consignment. (S13, ep 11)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Three Ring Circus Part 1: Karen comes up with a big idea for the shop, while Byron puts two ice hockey fans in their place when they get physical over a vintage puck. (S13, ep 12)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Three Ring Circus Part 2: It's the day of Karen's big event, but Ashley gives Les an ultimatum that could change American Jewelry and Loan forever. (S13, ep 13)

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: Separation Anxiety: With Ton missing, Allen struggles to keep the pawn shop afloat while training Elle to work an auction. (S4, ep 14)

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: Allen Vs. Ton: When Ton and Allen find themselves bidding against each other at an auction, their epic showdown leaves both their business and friendship in question. (S4, ep 15)

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: You Got Served: After a crushing defeat, the guys scramble to find new merchandise at a yard sale. (S4, ep 16)

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: Without A Chute: After a tough auction, things get worse when the shop's landlord wants to talk. (S4, ep 17)

programme.title: Irish Pickers
programme.desc: Limerick/Tipperary: Ian and Butzy drop in on Killeneure Castle, before rock'n'rolling to Limerick City for pop memorabilia from U2 and Thin Lizzy. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly:...
programme.desc: ...Henry's Wreck-trospective. The Bromley Wreck-Trospective: Get ready for a high-octane nostalgia trip as Junk & Disorderly Henry's Wreck-trospective dives into the archives.(S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Alien Energy: From military radar to Navy aircraft, sightings of Unidentified Aerial Phenomena have become more frequent - leading to unprecedented acceptance of alien contact. (S1, ep 1)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: The Black Knight: Is the satellite in Earth's orbit that astronauts discovered in 1998 the same one that Nikola Tesla detected back in 1899? (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Search for ET Intelligence: For thousands of years, humankind has attempted to make contact with extraterrestrial beings from beyond Earth. (S16, ep 14)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: UFOs and Native Americans: Native American myths steeped in the otherworldly go back thousands of years, but new evidence and modern-day UFO sightings have experts rethinking. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: UFOs: The Lost Evidence
programme.desc: UFOs vs the Royal Airforce: The Royal Airforce has been encountering UFOs on a regular basis since World War II, but the British government has consistently denied the sightings. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: Alleged sightings of leprechauns and fairies are nothing new in Ireland. Experts debate whether these Celtic creatures are fact or fiction. (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: Experts investigate if a mysterious caller had inside knowledge about the assassination of President John F Kennedy. (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: Experts investigate why religious apparitions appear on seemingly normal objects to seemingly normal people. Is it blind faith or supernatural phenomena? (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: Paranormal experts and skeptics explore the mysterious world of psychics. Is it a talent, a supernatural gift or a hoax? (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: What happens when people take their numerophobia too seriously? Experts investigate why certain numbers incite fear and panic in people. (S1, ep 19)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: Believers and skeptics debate the origins and meanings of the mysterious formations known as crop circles. (S1, ep 20)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: Experts investigate whether centuries-old paintings of aliens and UFOs are artistic renderings of real sightings, a coded message for humankind, or just a coincidence. (S1, ep 21)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: Experts investigate if a series of house fires across the UK are linked to an allegedly cursed portrait. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: 'Death shall come on swift wings to him who disturbs the peace of the King,' so the inscription goes. Is there truly a curse that haunts the original discoverers of Tutankhamun? (S1, ep 23)

programme.title: World's Most Unexplained
programme.desc: A strange creature was reportedly seen in a wooded area of Massachusetts by different people, all giving similar descriptions. Coincidence, collusion, or a genuine mystery? (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: Who is the Zodiac Killer?: In 1969, an unidentified killer taunted investigators with cryptic ciphers. Explore six theories that could help solve this 50-year-old mystery. (S4, ep 2)

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: Taking Their Shot: While the team tracks the tunnel towards the Baby Blob, Rick and Gary discover an unusual artefact marked with similar Roman numerals. (S11, ep 3)

programme.title: New: Greatest Prison Escapes...

programme.title: Queens Of Ancient Egypt
programme.desc: Cleopatra's Daughter: The story of Cleopatra Selene, the little-known daughter of Cleopatra and Antony, who witnessed her dynasty collapse but survived to become a great queen. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Evidence Of The Unexplained
programme.desc: Thousands of UFO sightings and abductions are reported every year. This series examines these accounts and casts new light on historic cases. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Paranormal Survivor
programme.desc: When Ghosts Attack Children: Paranormal activity in Evelyn Martin's new home turns from strange to scary, putting her sons in harm's way. (S4, ep 8)

programme.title: Haunted Hospitals

programme.title: Claw Hunters
programme.desc: Storm of the Century: Joe Ray assesses damage in Maine following a winter storm, while restauranteur Susan Povich faces logistical challenges serving lobster in Brooklyn. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Claw Hunters

programme.desc: Aliens And Robots: Experts investigate ancient tales and accounts of robots. If these sophisticated machines did exist in bygone days, what might have happened to them? (S8, ep 1)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens 8
programme.desc: Aliens B.C: Experts investigate whether the stories of a time when gods and otherworldly beings inhabited the planet are more than mere mythology. (S8, ep 2)

programme.title: Deep Water Salvage
programme.desc: Savage Salvage: John Ward and his crew attempt to salvage a barge upturned by a storm in a canal. Hickory Scuba Divers work to salvage a sailboat that's sunk at its mooring. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Skulls & Scoundrels: The Golds' good reputation is at stake, when a customer claims he was sold a fake watch, and Ashley offers a customer way over the odds for some gemstones. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S9, ep 48)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal
programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S9, ep 67)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry Cole gets excited as he visits automobilia heaven and the three Junketeers come together to flog restored items. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Auction Hunters
programme.desc: New. Hall Of Fame Game: Allen heads to an auction with Elle, while Ton and Big Sis revamp the shop to help bring in more customers. Allen unearths a Ouija board. (S4, ep 22)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Bid'em up: An item in one bin has Papa Bear and Mone revving their engines, while T Money gambles on guns being hidden in another bin. (S4, ep 3)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Rolling Thunder: A bin from down under holds a dark and mysterious surprise. (S4, ep 4)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Whack Job: The staff are pushed to their breaking point by a customer's endless parade of worthless items. Later, Ashley gets the chance to assert herself. (S3, ep 1)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Hot Rods, Raging Tempers: The Gold family and their employees are ready to haggle as members of the public continue to bring in their unique items in hope of raising some cash. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Acid Test: While Seth mulls over an expensive purchase that could save the store thousands, a customer attempts to sell a coat allegedly made of rare monkey fur. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: In 1993, a teenage girl walking her dog in Shropshire, England, witnesses a cylindrical object in the sky. School kids in Florida report multiple UFO sightings in 1967. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Close Encounters
programme.desc: In 1966, two Ohio police officers spot a strange light in the sky, triggering a chase across state lines. An ex-military man in Florida is knocked out by a beam of light in 1965. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: The Unxplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: The Search for Extraterrestrial Life: Scientists have forever been involved in a quest to understand the universe. But for each answer science provides, more questions arise. (S3, ep 22)

programme.title: Secrets In The Sand
programme.desc: Shimoa and the Sailing Stones: Rocks appear to magically move across a dry lakebed in America, while a major discovery is made in China's Ordos Desert. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When Pawns Cry: When an early handheld video game system comes into play, Corey tries his utmost to make a deal.

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry and Allen Millyard find and restore a legendary Triumph Trident bike before heading out for the historic Prescott Hill Climb. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Too Hot: In the sweltering heat, the bidders must fight for the ultimate blind buy - a unit completely hidden behind a sheet of plastic! (S4, ep 5)
